alert.note: Alert for Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 11 at 12:34PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Wakulla, southeastern Gadsden and southwestern Leon Counties through 115 PM EDT... At 1234 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 16 miles south of Greensboro to 14 miles west of Crawfordville to 12 miles north of Carrabelle. Movement was east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Crawfordville, Midway, Tallahassee, Sopchoppy, Lake Talquin, Shadeville, Brown House, Leon Sinks, Andrew, Wakulla Springs, Arran, Hilliardville, Eight Mile Pond, Tully, Fort Braden, Medart, Buckhorn, Wetumpka, Bethel and Helen. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Wakulla; Gadsden; Inland Wakulla; Leon
